articles.title: Welcome to Netrix!
articles.excerpt: Manage your mods and stay updated - Netrix 1.0.4 is here.
articles.content:
Netrix 1.0.4 is now live! This custom launcher and mod manager is your all-in-one hub for the CrashCraft network and the upcoming modded server. 

 With Netrix, you can:
  - Keep your modpack up to date
  - Get server status updates
  - View news and announcements

 This release brings key improvements and sets the stage for launch day.

 Stay connected with Netrix.
articles.author: StrataBytes

articles.title: Netrix Source Code Released
articles.excerpt: The full source code for Netrix is now available on GitHub for everyone to explore.
articles.content:
I'm happy to announce that the complete source code for Netrix is now publicly available on GitHub!

 This means you can now see exactly how Netrix works under the hood - from modpack management to server status integration. 

 I believe in transparency of the programs you run and this release is part of that!

                    Check it out here: https://github.com/StrataBytes/Netrix
articles.author: StrataBytes
